price: Kina A'di walikanusha. Basi ilikuwaje adhabu yangu na maonyo yangu?
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
footnotes: Kina A'di walimkadhibisha Mtume wao Hudi. Je, hali gani adhabu yangu na onyo langu lilikuwa kwa wendao kinyume!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
